title: Fresh lockdowns in China as local Covid-19 infections spread to 11 provinces
content:
1. Fresh lockdowns in China as local Covid-19 infections spread to 11 provinces  CNN
  2. China, still pursuing ‘zero Covid,’ has reported dozens of cases in recent days.  The New York Times
  3. Local Travel Restrictions and Lockdown in China Are Back to Curb New Outbreak  Bloomberg
  4. China warns of further spread in latest COVID-19 flare-up  Yahoo News
  5. Beijing Games competitors to face daily COVID-19 tests, remain in closed loop  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 中国でコヴィド-19の感染が11の省に広がり、新たなロックダウンが発生
由于当地的Covid-19感染扩散到11个省，中国出现了新的封锁措施
由於當地的Covid-19感染擴散到11個省，中國出現了新的封鎖措施
